text: hello everyone i am sunali aws solution
architect and now we will look into
how we can leverage amazon e2i with
aws aiml services to process healthcare
claim form
health care claim processing is the
determination of correct financial
responsibility of the incidence provider
and the patient
it involves creating a claim processing
workflow that checks each claim for its
authenticity correctness and validity
based on the coverage
because of the sensitivity of this
healthcare document
data needs to be accurately extracted
and often needs
human intervention
we will be using amazon techstruct
amazon comprehend medical
and amazon augmented ai to automate this
claim processing system
before jumping in let's look into these
services at very high level
amazon techstruct amazon extract is a
fully managed machine learning service
that automatically extracts printed text
handwriting and other data from
documents
this goes beyond simple optical
character recognition
or ocr to identify understand and
extract
data from forms and tables
we will be leveraging amazon text drug
to extract data from
our health care claim firms
the next service that we will look into
is amazon comprehend medical
amazon comprehend medical is a natural
language processing or nlp service that
uses machine learning to extract health
data from medical text we will be
leveraging amazon comprehend medical to
extract medical
entities such as medical condition test
treatment procedure
from our claim forms
finally amazon augmented ai or amazon
a2i
customer telling us that they can choose
only machine learning or
human for their workflows machine
learning only systems are high speed and
low cost but doesn't support that
nuanced decision making
human only workflows often one's
decision making but doesn't support that
low speed
and it comes with a high cost
customers want machine learning and
humans to work together
for a number of use cases and we will be
leveraging amazon augmented ai for our
document processing
use case for healthcare claim processing
and there are many benefits key benefits
to it
the first one is it helps you easily
implement human review workflow
and we will see this in our quick
demonstration
it reduces time to market and there are
multiple fundamental reasons to that
first a amazon 8y is pre-integrated with
aws ai services such as amazon extract
and amazon recognition
secondly amazon 8y provides over
60 different ui templates which can also
be customized
third as a human oversight is available
customer can put those machine learning
model in production
quickly for low confidence go result can
be verified by human being and those
results can be
leveraged for to retrain the machine
learning model
multiple workforce options are available
and we will see that during our
demonstration
it also integrates with other ai
services or custom machine learning
models
and finally it helps you improve worker
efficiency with ui templates
now let's look into our healthcare claim
processing
end-to-end solution

submitting our healthcare claim
processing and upload that to amazon s3
bucket
in an event-driven way amazon text truck
gets kicked in
which will extract all the entities from
our document
for low threshold data extraction we

for human review after we gather all the
data in an even driven way
we do a syntax validation such as like
checking the zip code
for valid claim forms we send it to

extract any medical entities such as
what this claim form is filed for to
